alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Logan; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 6:56AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN SHELBY, NORTHWESTERN LOGAN AND AUGLAIZE COUNTIES THROUGH 730 AM EST... At 656 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near New Bremen, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Wapakoneta, St. Marys, Fort Shawnee, New Bremen, Minster, Cridersville, Anna, Fort Loramie, Jackson Center, Botkins, Lakeview, New Knoxville, Waynesfield, Moulton, Buckland, Uniopolis, Kettlersville, Fryburg, Montra and Bloom Center. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 99 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
